US Release Date: August 9, 2025
Starring: Emily Beecham, Kristin Scott Thomas, Scarlett Johansson, Sienna Miller
Director: Kristin Scott Thomas
Synopsis: Heartfelt and funny, the film follows three sisters who return to their childhood home for a momentous weekend: the third wedding of their twice-widowed mother, Diana Frost (Kristin Scott Thomas). The three daughters are from vastly different walks of life: Katherine (Scarlett Johansson) is a Captain in the Royal Navy; Victoria (Sienna Miller) is a Hollywood star; and Georgina (Emily Beecham) is a hospice nurse.
